(I hope I'm not out of line, but I believe Soulstice said something about 
everyone thinking Yan was a roleplayer trying to destroy the Maximals from 
within, or something to that effect. I just want to go on record saying I do 
not think that of anyone, especially Yan, Ks, Jp, etc. They're the backbone 
of NBW, without them there wouldn't even be a NBW RPG.)

Hysteria/Tavatron

Hysteria:

There, now all she needed to do was enter the final code and the shields 
would reactivate and whatever outer weapons remained would power up. Well, 
either that or the engine core would explode. She opened a comm to IR:

"Uh, commander I suppose, should I attempt to repower the shields or allow 
the two aproaching Alliance 'bots to enter the bridge?"

The scanners had picked up two new 'bots flying straight for the CF's 
exposed bridge. She had to do something, but if she was ordered to do 
nothing... well, all she could do was hope it wouldn't come to that.

Tavatron:

Tavatron's scanners registered Dinobot nearby, only a few meters away in 
fact, but she did nothing to acknowledge his presence other than continue 
backing up toward Iron Raptor. Now was not the time for plesantries. 
Something was obviously amiss here. The Alliance did not give up so readily, 
of that she was sure. She stood her ground beside Iron Raptor, her staff 
still held beside her. She turned to face FZ and despretely tried to fight 
the urge to rip him apart. (Nuthin' personal, just some anti-FZ feelings for 
ya^_^)
